entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to flurries this evening and ending near midnight then clearing. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
